text: Nodolatirus nodatus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Nodolatirus nodatus (Gmelin, 1791). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=732677 on 2020-06-11 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Bouchet P. & Snyder M.A. (2013) New and old species of Benimakia (Neogastropoda: Fasciolariidae) and a description of Nodolatirus, new genus. Journal of Conchology 41(3): 331-341. ==External links== * Lesson A. (1842). Notes sur quelques coquilles marines rapportées de la Mer du Sud. Revue Zoologique par la Société Cuvierienne. 5: 102-104 Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1791
title: Nodolatirus nodatus
